verses.verse: And it came to pass a long <WH7227> time <WH3117> after <WH310> that the YY <WH3068> had given rest <WH5117> <WH8689> unto Yisra'EL <WH3478> from all their enemies <WH341> <WH8802> round about <WH5439>, that Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> waxed old <WH2204> <WH8804> and stricken <WH935> <WH8804> in age <WH3117>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> called <WH7121> <WH8799> for all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and for their elders <WH2205>, and for their heads <WH7218>, and for their judges <WH8199> <WH8802>, and for their officers <WH7860> <WH8802>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, I am old <WH2204> <WH8804> and stricken <WH935> <WH8804> in age <WH3117>:

And ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> all that the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto all these nations <WH1471> because <WH6440> of you; for the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> is he that hath fought <WH3898> <WH8737> for you.

Behold <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have divided <WH5307> <WH8689> unto you by lot these nations <WH1471> that remain <WH7604> <WH8737>, to be an inheritance <WH5159> for your tribes <WH7626>, from Yarden <WH3383>, with all the nations <WH1471> that I have cut off <WH3772> <WH8689>, even unto the great <WH1419> sea <WH3220> westward <WH3996> <WH8121>.

And the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, he shall expel <WH1920> <WH8799> them from before <WH6440> you, and drive <WH3423> <WH8689> them from out of your sight <WH6440>; and ye shall possess <WH3423> <WH8804> their land <WH776>, as the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765> unto you.

Be ye therefore very <WH3966> courageous <WH2388> <WH8804> to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> and to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all that is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the book <WH5612> of the Torah <WH8451> of Mosheh <WH4872>, that ye turn <WH5493> <WH8800> not aside therefrom to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left <WH8040>;

That ye come <WH935> <WH8800> not among these nations <WH1471>, these that remain <WH7604> <WH8737> among you; neither make mention <WH2142> <WH8686> of the name <WH8034> of their 'elohim <WH430>, nor cause to swear <WH7650> <WH8686> by them, neither serve <WH5647> <WH8799> them, nor bow <WH7812> <WH8691> yourselves unto them:
But cleave <WH1692> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, as ye have done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto this day <WH3117>.

For the YY <WH3068> hath driven out <WH3423> <WH8686> from before <WH6440> you great <WH1419> nations <WH1471> and strong <WH6099>: but as for you, no man <WH376> hath been able to stand <WH5975> <WH8804> before <WH6440> you unto this day <WH3117>.

One <WH259> man <WH376> of you shall chase <WH7291> <WH8799> a thousand <WH505>: for the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, he it is that fighteth <WH3898> <WH8737> for you, as he hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765> you.
Take good <WH3966> heed <WH8104> <WH8738> therefore unto yourselves <WH5315>, that ye love <WH157> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>.

Else if ye do in any wise <WH7725> <WH8800> go back <WH7725> <WH8799>, and cleave <WH1692> <WH8804> unto the remnant <WH3499> of these nations <WH1471>, even these that remain <WH7604> <WH8737> among you, and shall make marriages <WH2859> <WH8694> with them, and go in <WH935> <WH8804> unto them, and they to you:

Know <WH3045> <WH8799> for a certainty <WH3045> <WH8800> that the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> will no more <WH3254> <WH8686> drive out <WH3423> <WH8687> any of these nations <WH1471> from before <WH6440> you; but they shall be snares <WH6341> and traps <WH4170> unto you, and scourges <WH7850> in your sides <WH6654>, and tshofars <WH6796> in your eyes <WH5869>, until ye perish <WH6> <WH8800> from off this good <WH2896> land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you.

And, behold, this day <WH3117> I am going <WH1980> <WH8802> the way <WH1870> of all the earth <WH776>: and ye know <WH3045> <WH8804> in all your hearts <WH3824> and in all your souls <WH5315>, that not one <WH259> thing <WH1697> hath failed <WH5307> <WH8804> of all the good <WH2896> things <WH1697> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8765> concerning you; all are come to pass <WH935> <WH8804> unto you, and not one <WH259> thing <WH1697> hath failed <WH5307> <WH8804> thereof.

Therefore it shall come to pass, that as all good <WH2896> things <WH1697> are come <WH935> <WH8804> upon you, which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> promised <WH1696> <WH8765> you; so shall the YY <WH3068> bring <WH935> <WH8686> upon you all evil <WH7451> things <WH1697>, until he have destroyed <WH8045> <WH8687> you from off this good <WH2896> land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you.

When ye have transgressed <WH5674> <WH8800> the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> your 'Elohim <WH430>, which he commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> you, and have gone <WH1980> <WH8804> and served <WH5647> <WH8804> other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430>, and bowed <WH7812> <WH8694> yourselves to them; then shall the anger <WH639> of the YY <WH3068> be kindled <WH2734> <WH8804> against you, and ye shall perish <WH6> <WH8804> quickly <WH4120> from off the good <WH2896> land <WH776> which he hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> unto you.
